title: You're the Best, Lee Soon Shin
resume: You're the Best, Lee Soon-shin is a 2013 South Korean television series starring IU, Jo Jung-suk, Go Doo-shim, Lee Mi-sook, Yoo In-na, Son Tae-young, Go Joo-won, and Jung Woo. It aired on KBS2 from March 9 to August 25, 2013 on Saturdays and Sundays at 7:55 p.m. for 50 episodes. The drama is about a family devastated after the sudden death of the father, but who learn to find the true meaning of love and happiness, self-discovery and reconciliation.
